attractions.about: HO MAY PARK on Nui Lon’s peak – Vung Tau city is completely gathered with the factors creating a dreamlike landscape just like an Elysium, making the tourists everywhere become charmed and amazed. With the area of 50ha, at the height of over 250m compared with the sea water level, HỒ MÂY PARK always has cool and clean air, bringing an easy and comfortable feeling to the tourists. At the 120km distance from Ho Chi Minh City, HO MAY PARK is an ideal destination so that you can go sightseeing, relax and have happy and comfortable moments with your family and friends. This place is one of the famous tourist attractions in Vung Tau as well, it is favored by many domestic and foreign tourists. HO MAY PARK is a population of various landscapes in combination with many different forms of tour such as: ecological tour, spiritual tour, cultural tour, tour of entertainment, relaxation…If Ho May is considered as other Ba Na within Vung Tau, it is because the way to Ho May is rather special.
attractions.name: Ho May Park

attractions.about: Since long ago, people always try to solve problem by the same way: beginning-ending. That procedure only brings little improvement. So we take a step backward, turn it upside down to approach them, freshly. Thus Upside Down House wants to share with you the different angle of daily items to you. Besides the imaginetastic experience, you will be able to browse our gift shop and enjoy local drinks.

stays.name: Muong Thanh Vung Tau Hotel
stays.address: 09 Thong Nhat Street, Ward 1, Vung Tau Vietnam
stays.about: Located on Thong Nhat street right in center off Vung Tau City, Muong Thanh Vung Tau Hotel is an ideal place for you to explore Tam Duong Bay, Vong Nguyet Bathing Place and other famous sightseeing of Vung Tau such as Quang Trung Park, the Central Square, the Cultural Museum. Especially, it is extremely favorable to come from Muong Thanh Vung Tau to Ho Chi Minh City with a hydrofoil pier hundreds of meter far away from the hotel. The hotel has full modern amenities and services including gym; outdoor swimming pool; conference rooms; bars; Europe & Asia restaurants with a professional team of chefs who serve well-known seafood dishes; karaoke systems with excellent sound, beautiful decors which make Muong Thanh Vung Tau a reliable address when visiting the Southern sea city.

stays.name: Mercure Vung Tau
stays.address: 03-06 Ha Long Ward 2, Vung Tau 790000 Vietnam
stays.about: Nestled in Nghinh Phong cape, Mercure Vung Tau offers a beautiful panoramic ocean view for your tranquil vacation.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Pullman Vung Tau
stays.address: 15 Thi Sach Street Thang Tam Ward, Vung Tau Vietnam
stays.about: Pullman Vung Tau is the first 5 star international hotel in Vung Tau City. It is just 1.5 hour drive away and closest beach destination from Ho Chi Minh City. It offers 356 rooms and suites featuring Pullman signature standard with spectacular ocean views over the Back Beach as well as the Front Beach. The hotel has 1 all day dining restaurant with international cuisine, bars and bakery. It has 2 stories conference centre catering up to 1,200 participants, fit lounge and outdoor swimming pool.

stays.name: The Imperial Hotel & Resort Vung Tau
stays.address: 159 Thuy Van Street, Vung Tau 790000 Vietnam
stays.about: The IMPERIAL Hotel and Resort is the first and the only 5-star hotel & resort with its own private beach and fabulous Beach Club in Vung Tau city. Situated on its own stretch of private sandy beach in the seaside resort town of Vung Tau, The IMPERIAL Hotel and Resort is truly an art boutique hotel, completely unique in concept and design. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you. Rooms at The Imperial Hotel and Resort Vung Tau offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free WiFi. Room service and a concierge are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A pool and free breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to The Imperial Hotel and Resort Vung Tau, free parking is available with 24 hours security surveillance. Close to some of Vung Tau's most popular landmarks, such as The Vung Tau War Heroes Shrine (0.4 mi) and The Whale Temple (0.8 mi), The Imperial Hotel and Resort Vung Tau is a great destination for tourists. If you’re looking for a steakhouse, consider a visit to RuSeasons restaurant-club or Riviera Restaurant, which are all conveniently located a short distance from The Imperial Hotel Vung Tau. Should time allow, Thich Ca Phat Dai is a popular historic site that is relatively easy to get to. We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at The Imperial Hotel and Resort Vung Tau as you experience all of the things Vung Tau has to offer.

stays.name: The Wind Boutique Resort
stays.address: B10, 84 Phan Chu Trinh, Vung Tau Vietnam
stays.about: Escape to modern luxury in a peaceful, tropical setting. The Wind is Vung Tau's only Spa Inclusive Resort. We offer personalized service in a space that’s beautiful, peaceful, and surprisingly upscale. Our cliff-side location, waterfalls, and beautiful tropical gardens make The Wind Boutique Resort one of a kind. Our rooms are tastefully decorated and fully equipped with the finest items - modern kitchens, 50” LCDs, and leather couches. Every room is unique and has been carefully designed for your comfort. Relax amongst our multiple waterfalls while the children play in the pool, or enjoy a romantic evening while you take-in the city lights from our cliff overlook bar. And of course we offer high speed internet everywhere on the property, so you’re only as removed as you wish to be. Our other facilities include an outdoor pool, steam room, sauna, billiards, jacuzzi, pool bar, and children's shallow swimming area. We have a free shuttle service to the shops, beaches, and amenities around town, and we’re within 5 minutes walk to a selection of restaurants nearby. Front beach is 1.1km while back beach is 1.8km.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

stays.name: Fusion Suites Vung Tau
stays.address: 02 Truong Cong Dinh Ward 2, Vung Tau 790000 Vietnam
stays.about: Fusion Suites Vung Tau brings originality and a wellness inspired hotel to the seaside town of Vung Tau. It has set a new trend with 170 stylish suites, studios and apartments with expansive ocean and mountain views. Featuring daily spa treatments at no extra cost, yoga classes, fitness center, 8 uniquely designed sky pools and a rooftop infinity pool. You can enjoy breakfast, lunch or dinner in the 19th floor restaurant "Fresh" with 360 degree views or indulge in a few cocktails in the best rooftop bar in town "Breeze". The ground floor features “Fusion Courtyard" with a café, weekend burger bar, bubble tea station and wine shop. Fusion Suites also offers banquet meeting rooms for up to 240 people.Only 2 hours drive from Saigon by road or direct ferry, Fusion Suites Vung Tau is ideal for families, couples, groups and solos looking to swap urban bustle for coastal calm without involving a trip to the airport.If you are looking for a modern hotel in a great location with exceptional food and beverage outlets, premium spa and a friendly team - then Fusion Suites Vung Tau is your destination!

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

Especially, it is extremely favorable to come from Muong Thanh Vung Tau to Ho Chi Minh City with a hydrofoil pier hundreds of meter far away from the hotel. The hotel has full modern amenities and services including gym; outdoor swimming pool; conference rooms; bars; Europe & Asia restaurants with a professional team of chefs who serve well-known seafood dishes; karaoke systems with excellent sound, beautiful decors which make Muong Thanh Vung Tau a reliable address when visiting the Southern sea city.

stays.name: Malibu Hotel
stays.address: 263 Le Hong Phong Street, Thang Tam Ward, Vung Tau 790000 Vietnam
stays.about: Finding an ideal trendy hotel in Vung Tau does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Malibu Hotel, a nice option for travelers like you.Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, a refrigerator, and a minibar, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.Malibu Hotel features room service and a concierge, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and free breakfast. If you are driving to Malibu Hotel, free parking is available.While staying at Malibu Hotel, visitors can check out The Vung Tau War Heroes Shrine (0.5 mi) and The Whale Temple (1.0 mi), some of Vung Tau's top attractions.When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out OMG (Oh My God) Restaurant, Cj's Pub, and Banana Leaf Restaurant, which are some diners that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.Best of all, Malibu Hotel makes it easy to experience some great Vung Tau attractions like Vung Tau Lighthouse, which is a popular lighthouse.Malibu Hotel puts the best of Vung Tau at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

stays.name: The Wind Mountain Side Hotel
stays.address: 98 Phan Chu Trinh, Vung Tau Vietnam
stays.about: The Wind Mountain Side Hotel is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Vung Tau, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay. The Wind is the only Spa Inclusive Hotel in Vung Tau. Rooms at The Wind Mountain Side Hotel offer air conditioning, a minibar, and a refrigerator providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi. A 24 hour front desk, room service, and 24 hour check-in are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A pool and breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to The Wind Mountain Side Hotel, free parking is available. Nearby landmarks such as The Whale Temple (0.5 mi) and Hon Ba Island (0.6 mi) make The Wind Mountain Side Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Vung Tau. While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the Asian restaurants, including Ganh Hao, Ganh Hao 2 Restaurant, and Offshore Bar & Hotel Restaurant, all of which are a short distance from The Wind Mountain Side Hotel. During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Christ the King (0.7 mi), Vung Tau Lighthouse (0.3 mi), and Vung Tau Ferry Terminal (0.6 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel. Enjoy your stay in Vung Tau!

stays.name: Romeliess Hotel
stays.address: 31-33 Thuy Van Street, Ward 02, Vung Tau Vietnam
stays.about: See why so many travelers make Romeliess Hotel their small hotel of choice when visiting Vung Tau. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Close to some of Vung Tau's most popular landmarks, such as The Whale Temple (0.3 mi) and Mui Nghinh Phong (0.7 mi), Romeliess Hotel is a great destination for tourists.Romeliess Hotel is a family-friendly small hotel offering a minibar, air conditioning, and a refrigerator in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.The small hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and 24 hour check-in. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Vung Tau. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the barbeque restaurants, including Don Quijote Restaurant, La SIRENA Bar & Grill, and Red Parrot Bar, all of which are a short distance from Romeliess Hotel.If you are interested in exploring Vung Tau, check out a park, such as Tao Phung Park.At Romeliess Hotel, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Vung Tau.

stays.name: Binh Chau Hot Spring Resort
stays.address: National Highway 55, Binh Chau Xuyen Moc District, Ba Ria, Vung Tau Vietnam
stays.about: Binh Chau Hot Spring Resort offers an extraordinary balanced blend of all the gifts from nature. It is only here that you and your loved ones can enjoy uninterrupted peaceful moments while soaking in the fresh mineral stream to re-calibrate both body and mind. The warm water stream containing precious minerals from nature that encourage muscles and joints recovery, reduce pain or aches, reverse the aging process and give back to you soundless sleeps and rejuvenating getaway with the family.

stays.name: Lotus Apartment Hotel
stays.address: 6/11 Nguyen Du, Phuong 1, Thanh Pho, Vung Tau Vietnam
stays.about: See why so many travelers make Lotus Apartment Hotel their small hotel of choice when visiting Vung Tau. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.As your “home away from home,” the small hotel rooms offer air conditioning, a kitchenette, and a refrigerator, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge while staying at Lotus Apartment Hotel. And, as an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.Nearby landmarks such as The Vung Tau War Heroes Shrine (1.1 mi) and The Whale Temple (1.5 mi) make Lotus Apartment Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Vung Tau.Vung Tau has plenty of steakhouses. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Riviera Restaurant and RuSeasons restaurant-club, which are serving up some great dishes.If you are interested in exploring Vung Tau, check out a park, such as Tao Phung Park.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Lotus Apartment Hotel as you experience all of the things Vung Tau has to offer.

stays.name: Seaside Resort
stays.address: 28 Tran Phu Street, Ward 01, Vung Tau 790000 Vietnam
stays.about: Welcome to Seaside Resort, your Vung Tau “home away from home.” Seaside Resort aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.While staying at Seaside Resort, visitors can check out White Palace (0.2 mi) and Hon Ba Island (1.1 mi), some of Vung Tau's top attractions.Guest rooms offer air conditioning and a minibar, and Seaside Resort makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a concierge and room service. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast during their visit. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.Travelers looking to enjoy some lobster can head to Ganh Hao. Otherwise, you may want to check out a steakhouse such as RuSeasons restaurant-club or Riviera Restaurant.Should time allow, Duc Me Bai Dau and Vung Tau Ferry Terminal are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.Seaside Resort puts the best of Vung Tau at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

stays.name: Green Hotel
stays.address: 147C Thuy Van Thang Tam Ward, Vung Tau 790000 Vietnam
stays.about: Coveniently located at 147C Thuy Van street Thang Tam ward Vung Tau city, Ba Ria - Vung Tau provice. Offers 50 sea view Rooms and Suites, the Three-star Green Hotel become the most favorite destination of the travelers and businessmen. Amenities include IDD telephone, satellite television chanel, DVD Player, mini-bar, tea and coffe-makers and in-room safe. Complimentary Wi-Fi Internet in-room and throughout the Hotel.Two restaurants served exellent foods from Vietnamese to international Cuisines especially Seafood specialties.Three Meeting Rooms with capacity of 20 to 350 guests equipped with modern meeting facilities can be satisfied any kind of your functions. A Wedding Hall 300 seats committed best quality of facilites as well as services.For your leisure and relexation, our warm, cozy atmosphere Lobby-bar serves wonderful Cocktails and Drinks with charmed and professional staffs.

stays.name: Sky Luck Hotel
stays.address: 12/3 Hoang Hoa Tham Street, Ward 2, Vung Tau Vietnam
stays.about: Looking for a place to stay in Vung Tau? Then look no further than Sky Luck Hotel, a budget friendly small hotel that brings the best of Vung Tau to your doorstep.Guest rooms offer air conditioning, a minibar, and a kitchenette, and Sky Luck Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the small hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge. As an added convenience, there is parking available to guests.While staying at Sky Luck Hotel, visitors can check out Hon Ba Island (0.2 mi) and The Vung Tau War Heroes Shrine (0.8 mi), some of Vung Tau's top attractions.Vung Tau has plenty of seafood restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Ganh Hao, Ganh Hao 2 Restaurant, and Lan Rung, which are serving up some great dishes.If you’re looking for something to do, Christ the King (1.1 mi), Vung Tau Lighthouse (0.5 mi), and Vung Tau Ferry Terminal (0.2 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of Sky Luck Hotel.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Sky Luck Hotel as you experience everything Vung Tau has to offer.

stays.address: 47 Phan Van Tri street Thang Tam ward, Vung Tau 790000 Vietnam
stays.about: Ideally located in the best advantageous tourist place Bai Sau Beach at Vung Tau city, the new built VEEVOO Hotel is totally a perfect accommodation choice for sharing memorable moments with family and friends… We offers guest 30 convenient rooms: Standard double, Standard twin & Superior; each equipped with modern equipment & facilities, free wifi access…

For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Vung Tau, Petro Hotel is located a short distance from White Palace (0.5 mi) and The Vung Tau War Heroes Shrine (1.2 mi).If you like diners, Petro Hotel is conveniently located near OMG (Oh My God) Restaurant, Cj's Pub, and Banana Leaf Restaurant.Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out an architectural building, such as Thich Ca Phat Dai.Petro Hotel puts the best of Vung Tau at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

stays.name: Premier Pearl Hotel Vung Tau
stays.address: 69 THUY VAN, PHU_NG 2, Vung Tau 78000 Vietnam
stays.about: Set the scene for a truly memorable stay by experiencing the uninterrupted sea view rooms blended with unsurpassed luxury and comfort , indulge in our enticing international cuisine restaurants or seaside bars, swim in the awe inspiring infinity pool under sunshine, enjoy the lanscaped sea view with crystal clear waters ideal for travellers seeking a relaxing retreat on the beach.

stays.name: Hoang Phat Hotel
stays.address: 1 La Van Cau Thang Tam Ward, Vung Tau 78210 Vietnam
stays.about: Located in Vung Tau City in Ba Ria - Vung Tau Province, 1.4 km from Vung Tau Statue of Christ, Vung Tau Lighthouse is about 18 minutes walk, Nghinh Phong Cape 2.1 km and White Palace 2, 8 km, Hoang Phat Hotel offers a terrace, 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi. All rooms have air conditioning, flat-screen cable TV, kettle, bidet, free toiletries, work desk, wardrobe and refrigerator. .

stays.name: Vung Tau Riva Hotel
stays.address: 03 - 05 Thuy Van Ward 2, Vung Tau 78000 Vietnam
stays.about: Riva Hotel would like to offer to our guests great experiences on during vacation at Vung Tau beautiful beach city, Riva Hotel is designed with a unique style and high class furniture and equipped with rich wood furnishings combined with wooden floors create the luxurious style, located on the poetic beach of Thuy Van street, an ideal destination to be able to walk from the hotel and just 10 minutes walk to Circle K+, Restaurants, Cafes, Bars and 500 meters to Jesus Statue on Tao Phung Mountain.

stays.name: Petro House Hotel
stays.address: 63 Tran Hung Dao Street Ward 1, Vung Tau 790000 Vietnam
stays.about: Located right in the heart of Vung Tau, Petro House is a boutique business hotel, welcoming both business and leisure guests alike to Vung Tau since the 60’s. Renovated in 2012, the hotel retains the charm of the original colonial architecture, with columns and arch windows. Her spacious guest rooms have been thoroughly modernized, delivering comfort, safety and connectivity.

stays.name: Novena Hotel
stays.address: 302 Phan Chu Trinh Ward 2, Vung Tau 790000 Vietnam
stays.about: Novena Hotel located on 302 Phan Chu Trinh, Ward 2, Vung Tau City, Viet Nam. 3 minutes by walking to back beach, 5 minutes by walking to Jesus Statue, 1,5 Km to Thang Tam Temple, 1,5 km to Niet Ban Tinh Xa, 2 km by car from shopping center lottemart, Bank Khot cake...Novena Hotel are please welcome and serve our guests with all the best.

stays.name: Hai Duong Intourco Resort
stays.address: 01 Thuy Van, Ward 8, Vung Tau Vietnam
stays.about: Situated right on the Back Beach of Vung Tau city – Viet Nam, HaiDuong Intourco Resort to be proud of bringing you to the best convinience. Immersing yourself in the blue seawater to refresh yourshelf after hard- working days. With two separate space: HaiDuong Intourco Resort has almost room in building area for guests, who would like staying together, closing and crowded. And villa area has private balcony with garden view/ sea view. It brings to you the closing natural feeling, quiet and peaceful. At HaiDuong Intourco Resort, you can have the elegant breakfast also enjoy the first sunlight of day on the beach. Or having lunch/ dinner/ sea food… in elsewhere sea – swing, seeing the sunlight/moonlight in fresh seawater and dissolving in each white waves. Along the beach, a lot of shack and folding chairs arranged to free for staying guests. As your home, you can come to a halt, take team activities or lie down on folding chair to hear song of sea.

stays.name: Ocean Star Hotel
stays.address: S_ 43A  Thuy Van, Phu_ng 2, Vung Tau Vietnam
stays.about: Welcome to Ocean Star Hotel, your Vung Tau “home away from home.” Ocean Star Hotel aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as The Whale Temple (0.3 mi) and Mui Nghinh Phong (0.8 mi), guests of Ocean Star Hotel can easily experience some of Vung Tau's most well known attractions.Rooms at Ocean Star Hotel offer air conditioning and a refrigerator providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.A 24 hour front desk and baggage storage are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. An on-site restaurant will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Ocean Star Hotel, free parking is available.Travelers looking to enjoy some lobster can head to Ganh Hao. Otherwise, you may want to check out a steakhouse such as RuSeasons restaurant-club or Riviera Restaurant.Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out a lighthouse, such as Vung Tau Lighthouse.Ocean Star Hotel puts the best of Vung Tau at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

stays.name: Ngoc Hanh Beach Hotel
stays.address: 47-49 Thuy Van, Ward 2, Vung Tau Vietnam

stays.name: Royal Hotel Vung Tau
stays.address: 36 Quang Trung St., Vung Tau Vietnam
stays.about: If you’re looking for a hotel in Vung Tau, look no further than Royal Hotel Vung Tau.While staying at Royal Hotel Vung Tau, visitors can check out Thich Ca Phat Dai (0.2 mi) and White Palace (0.5 mi), some of Vung Tau's top attractions.Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, a minibar, and a desk, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.Royal Hotel Vung Tau features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and an on-site restaurant. If you are driving to Royal Hotel Vung Tau, parking is available.While in Vung Tau be sure to experience local hotpot favorites at Ganh Hao.During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Vung Tau Lighthouse (1.1 mi), Vung Tau Ferry Terminal (0.5 mi), and Hon Ba Island (0.5 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.The staff at Royal Hotel Vung Tau looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

stays.name: Nguyen Ha Hotel
stays.address: 81/16 Thuy Van, Ward 2, Vung Tau Vietnam
stays.about: Welcome to Nguyen Ha Hotel, your Vung Tau “home away from home.” Nguyen Ha Hotel aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Close to some of Vung Tau's most popular landmarks, such as The Whale Temple (0.3 mi) and Mui Nghinh Phong (0.8 mi), Nguyen Ha Hotel is a great destination for tourists.The rooms offer air conditioning and a refrigerator, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.Nguyen Ha Hotel features a 24 hour front desk.While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the Italian restaurants, including David Pizzeria, Ly's Coffee & Cakes, and Prego Yogurt, all of which are a short distance from Nguyen Ha Hotel.If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Christ the King (0.4 mi), Vung Tau Lighthouse (0.8 mi), or Vung Tau Ferry Terminal (1.2 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.Nguyen Ha Hotel puts the best of Vung Tau at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

stays.name: Marina Bay Vung Tau Resort & Spa
stays.address: 115 Tran Phu Ward 5, Vung Tau 790000 Vietnam
stays.about: Discover your paradise in Vung Tau and enjoy life to the fullest with Marina Bay Vung Tau Resort & Spa. The first and only 5-star beachfront resort in Vung Tau City that offer splendid sea view from all 100 rooms and suites.

property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room
